pvz.unit

Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pvz.unit.Unit
        • pvz.unit.PerishableUnit
          • pvz.unit.Zombie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConeZombie, FlagZombie, NormalZombie

    public abstract class Zombie
extends PerishableUnit
    This class is the parent of all zombie types. It contains default information shared by several of its subclasses.
    Since:
    1.7
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
